lead_paragraph: Prosecutors cited “deplorable conditions” for the 55 cats, 12 dogs and two turtles that Elizabeth Grant, 48, kept at her Jackson Heights home.

headline.print_headline: Woman in Queens Is Facing Charges of Animal Cruelty
headline.main: Queens Woman Charged With Animal Cruelty

snippet: Prosecutors cited “deplorable conditions” for the 55 cats, 12 dogs and two turtles that Elizabeth Grant, 48, kept at her Jackson Heights home.
abstract: Queens woman Elizabeth Grant is charged with aggravated cruelty to animals and other counts after police find 55 cats, 12 dogs and two turtles in her home, all uncared for.
